title: Why did google remove the direct image link button and make things 100 times more tedious?
body:
When using the image search, you'd find what you want, click the 'view image' or whatever button, and do what you need to do from there right?

https://i.imgur.com/t6O7mwg.jpg/img

For whatever reason that button is gone now and the only two are left are 'visit' for the site the image is from and to 'share' the image on dumb as heck social media things like facebook and whatnot

Literally why? What the heck are they thinking?

Are they trying to make people seriously think over the very idea of using something like freaking bing or what?

Where do I complain to call them dum dums for this? 

Cuz this is _tilting_ me
